item.title: Corona Geek #113 – Android TV, GameCircle Support, and Game Templates
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: During this week's Corona Geek Hangout Greg Pugh shares his experience with getting his Fire TV game working on Android TV. Sergey Lerg shows us how to edit manifest file settings after building for Android, and we explored several Corona game template resources.
item.content:encoded:
During this week’s Corona Geek Hangout Greg Pugh shares his experience with getting his Fire TV game, Maddie Bear SnackTime, working on Android TV. Sergey Lerg shows us how to edit manifest file settings after building for Android, and we explored Corona game template resources from Ragdog Studios, T and G Apps, and Roaming Gamer.

Play “Geek Games” for a chance to win a $50 gift card.

Remember to put your gaming skills to go use. Post your 2048 Hex high score to the Corona Geek Facebook wall for a chance to win a $50 gift card to a retailer of your choice! Multiple entries are allowed. Post each time you get a new high score. A winner will be announced next week on November 3rd. Good luck!

Replay Last Week’s Show

  • Corona Geek #112 – Windows Phone 8 Development and Dynamic Masks
  • Corona University

Apps

  • 2048 Hex – A new angle on 2048 puzzle games

Resources

  • Burtons Media Group – Corona Books – use coupon code CoronaGeek at checkout to save 20%
  • GPAnimations
  • Spiral Code Studio – Corona Games and Development
  • Roaming Gamer – Game Templates and Tools
  • Ragdog Studios
  • T and G Apps
  • Android TV – Getting Started
  • Android TV – Controller Button Codes
  • Android-apktool
  • GameCircle plugin support
  • BizSpark Enrollment Tutorial – Access Azure, Visual Studio, and more.

Other

  • AT&T Doubles Data Plans

Thank you for listening to and following Corona Geek:

  • Listen to Corona Geek on Stitcher
  • Subscribe to Corona Geek on YouTube

item.title: Corona Geek Snippets – Graphics 2.0 Talk and Gear Jumping Fun
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Monday's Corona Geek was a long one. We hung out with CEO, Walter Luh to discuss the exciting new Corona SDK Graphics 2.0 Public Beta. Walter talked about some of the new graphics filter effects while sharing some insights into where Corona SDK has been and where it's headed. If you don't have time to watch the whole Hangout, here are a few clips to help you get your geek on.
item.content:encoded:
Monday’s Corona Geek was a long one. We hung out with CEO, Walter Luh to discuss the exciting new Corona SDK Graphics 2.0 Public Beta. Walter talked about some of the new graphics filter effects while sharing some insights into where Corona SDK has been and where it’s headed.

Also, Roaming Gamer’s Ed Maurina walked us through his Gear Jumper game template with a few Graphics 2.0 filter effects applied.

If you don’t have time to watch the whole Hangout, here are a few clips to help you get your geek on.

Thank you for watching, we’ll see you on next week’s Corona Geek hangout!

Remember To Subscribe and Thumbs Up Videos

    • Download the Corona Geek podcast on iTunes
    • Listen to Corona Geek on Stitcher
    • Subscribe to Corona Geek on YouTube
